mapper.select: SELECT tbuser.id ,tbuser.username ,tbuser.nick ,tbuser.sfrom ,tbuser.name ,tbuser.process ,tbuser.phone ,tbuser.mpic ,tbuser.deleted ,tbuser.created_at as createdAt ,tbuser.modified_at as modifiedAt FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id = #{id}

SELECT tbuser.id FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id is not null AND tbuser.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbuser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND tbuser.username = #{username} AND tbuser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND tbuser.process = #{process} AND tbuser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND tbuser.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbuser.created_at

SELECT tbuser.id FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id is not null AND tbuser.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbuser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND tbuser.username = #{username} AND tbuser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND tbuser.process = #{process} AND tbuser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND tbuser.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbuser.created_at ORDER BY tbuser.created_at ORDER BY tbuser.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(tbuser.id) as listsize FROM tbuser WHERE tbuser.id is not null AND tbuser.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbuser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND tbuser.username = #{username} AND tbuser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND tbuser.process = #{process} AND tbuser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND tbuser.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbuser.created_at
